channel.title: Moldova on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in Moldova on UN-aligned

item.title: Ukraine and Moldova's EU candidacy status… beneficial?
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: The European Union recently granted applicant status to Ukraine and Moldova. If approved, its many benefits, even rivalling NATO’s, include deterring Russia’s war machine. Here are some key questions surrounding the topic.
